name: Roasted Balsamic Beets with Feta
description: Beets are at their best in the fall and winter, so add a pop of colour to your plates this season. They’re just as much a feast for the eyes as they are for the tastebuds, but here’s more to beets than just good looks: they’re jam packed with flavour and nutrients, too. Quick tip: toss the cooked beets, feta, and nuts with a few handfuls of fresh greens for a warm salad.
preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Peel and chop beets into bite-size pieces. Place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave for 10 min, or until softened.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine oil, vinegar, dressing mix, and syrup.
Toss steamed beets with vinegar mixture and transfer to pan; bake 5 min.
Transfer to serving dish and top with feta and additional toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup roast potatoes.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!
